Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by Drs. Mary M. Mader and Lori S. Friedman, Chairs of the AACR Chemistry in Cancer Research Working Group. The 2024 CICR Town Hall will feature three presentations from experts in the cancer chemistry community on the theme of "Losing our inhibitions – is (protein) degradation preferred?" followed by a panel discussion. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM04. Losing our Inhibitions – Is (Protein) Degradation Preferred?: A Chemistry in Cancer Research Working Group Town Hall Meeting
Title: Losing our Inhibitions – Is (Protein) Degradation Preferred?: A Chemistry in Cancer Research Working Group Town Hall Meeting
